author: ppf.
content:
finally we show txs on dd12 ðŸ˜¬  https://dencun-devnet-12.beaconcha.in/transactions

- needed to fork https://github.com/gobitfly/rocketpool-go because of geth-upgrade which dropoed address.Hash() which rpl is depending on
- needed to switch go geth-client for indexing for now since `ethpandaops/erigon:devel-33fc53f` was not able to start (something about "db is too large for current system"), we hope to not have to switch right now for production
- we are not sure yet if we store blobs yet

author: parithosh
content: some default seems borked then <@&688101493978562687> , we add `  - --db.size.limit=1100GB` to our node and don't face the issue. I think <@412614104222531604> ran into the same issue on local testing yesterday too.
